It would be "an absolute godsend for Donald Trump" if rapper Kanye West was to run for president ahead of the 2020 presidential election according to Sky News host Rita Panahi. 

"You wouldn't put anything past 2020, anything could happen," Ms Panahi told Sky…

articles.author: Tom Decent
articles.title: 'Don't judge them like veterans': Junior Wallabies coach on nurturing Australia's next generation - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Jason Gilmore has seen some excellent players come through the nation's pathway systems but had a warning for anyone making early judgments.
articles.content:
Asked whether the hype was a good or a bad influence, Gilmore outlined his experiences having worked closely with young stars for several years.
Theyre always the new thing, they get signed quickly … [+2552 chars]

articles.title: Slater: The NRL is ‘making an example’ of Leilua – it wasn’t worth four weeks - Fox Sports
articles.description: NRL legend Billy Slater has questioned the four-match ban Tigers’ loose cannon Joseph Leilua was handed for an <a href="https://www.foxsports.com.au/nrl/nrl-premiership/more-joey-leilua-crap-sparks-fire-as-tigers-and-panthers-players-go-nuts-at-each-other/new…
articles.content:
Slater said that while Leilua brought the game into disrepute with his actions, a four-game suspension was excessive and the NRL judiciary was making an example of the Wests centre.
Leilua has been … [+2292 chars]
